author: jsdelfino
msg: Upgrade to HTTPD 2.4.2, APR 1.4.6, Memcached 1.4.13, Python 2.7.3, Ubuntu 12.04, and Mac OS X 10.7.4.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Minor memory management, performance, and tracing improvements.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Add a timeout property to the CURL HTTP clients.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Add an HTTPD auth provider allowing the authentication logic to be implemented by a component, and cleanup the SSL and mod-security config a bit.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Improve caching support and some of the navigations in the hosting environment.
